Meta.MetaDescription: Quick intro to the test portfolio.

ContentBlocks.BodyText: This is a short test entry.

Meta.MetaDescription: A pillar page covering my software development work including testing, development practices, and support processes.

ContentBlocks.BodyText: Software development has been a core part of my professional and personal journey. This page acts as a central hub for everything related to my engineering work, from testing methodologies to development practices and long-term support strategies.

Testing is a fundamental part of delivering reliable software. I focus on automated testing, unit testing, integration testing, and UI Automation testing to ensure that projects remain stable as they grow. My goal is to build confidence in every release and demonstrate strong testing discipline across my portfolio.

My development work spans web applications, tools, and experimental projects. I enjoy exploring new technologies, refining my coding standards, and building solutions that solve real problems. This section will showcase development logs, technical breakdowns, and insights gained from hands-on experience.

Support and sustained engineering play a vital role in ensuring that software remains stable, performant, and maintainable throughout its lifecycle. My approach focuses on long-term stewardship of each project—addressing technical debt, refining architecture, and implementing structured maintenance practices. This includes proactive support processes, Application Performance Monitoring (APM), iterative improvements, and lifecycle planning to ensure systems continue to operate reliably as technologies, user expectations, and environments evolve.

Meta.MetaTitle: Creative Works and Visual Design Portfolio
Meta.MetaDescription: A pillar page showcasing my creative projects including digital assets and game development.

ContentBlocks.BodyText: Creativity plays a major role in my work beyond software development. This page brings together my artistic explorations — from 2D and 3D digital assets to interactive projects — into a single space. It serves as a central showcase for experimentation, learning, and creative exploration.

Digital assets include 2D artwork, 3D models, textures, UI elements, and other creative pieces produced for personal projects or experimentation. This section highlights my design process, tools used, and the evolution of my artistic style over time.
